title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause of ransomware infection in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and lowest at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
The Percentage of respondents of Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is 4.19% larger than the minimum value at Malicious websites/web ads.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause of ransomware infection in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and lowest at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
The Percentage of respondents of Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is 4.19% larger than the minimum value at Malicious websites/web ads.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and Percentage of respondents in each Cause of ransomware infection on the y axis.

The maximum Percentage of respondents 67.0 is found at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and the minimum is found at Malicious websites/web ads where Cause of ransomware infection is 16.0.
The minimum Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads has got 4.19 times less Percentage of respondents than the maximum Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails.

Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is higher than any other Cause of ransomware infections with value 67.0, followed by Lack of cyber security training, and Weak passwords/access management. Down to Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads with the lowest value 16.0.
Similar Percentage of respondents is found in Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads, and Report clickbait.
The Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails tends to be 2.12 percent higher than average.
